text:
@CNN How do we stop trump from dismantling Affordable Care Act? This is NOT the time to take away people's health care! Lives are at stake. 

We are in a war with Coronavirus. Trump is responsible for over 125,000 Amercian deaths. Guess that's not enough for him.
